recipe.title: Traditional Apple-Walnut Charoset
ingredients: 3 medium Gala or Fuji apples, peeled, cored, and finely diced
1 1/2 cups walnut halves, lightly toasted, cooled, and coarsely chopped
1/2 cup sweet red wine such as Manischewitz Extra Heavy Malaga
instructions: In large bowl, stir together all ingredients. Store, covered, at room temperature until ready to serve.
